name: PogoMap
description: The fastest Pok√©mon Go Map available

USERNAME.description: Your username to login to the specified authentication service.

PASSWORD.description: Your password to login to the specified authentication service.

LOCATION.description: Location on which the map should be centered. This can be an address, co-ordinates or any string that Google Maps accepts.

GMAPS_KEY.description: A Google Maps API key for this application.

EXTRA_ARGS.description: Any extra arguments that you want to pass to runserver.py. E.g. -c
